Initializer# init(coder:)

macOS 10.9+

```
init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSAppearance/init(coder:)#see-also)

### [Creating an Appearance](/documentation/AppKit/NSAppearance/init(coder:)#Creating-an-Appearance)

[`init?(named: NSAppearance.Name)`](/documentation/appkit/nsappearance/init(named:))Creates an appearance object based on the name of one of the standard system appearances.[`init?(appearanceNamed: NSAppearance.Name, bundle: Bundle?)`](/documentation/appkit/nsappearance/init(appearancenamed:bundle:))Creates an appearance object from the named appearance file located in the specified bundle.
